00035 class DccVoiceCodec
00036 {
00037 public:
00038         DccVoiceCodec();
00039         virtual ~DccVoiceCodec();
00040 protected:
00041         KviCString m_szName;
00042 public:
00043         const char * name();
00044         virtual void encode(KviDataBuffer * signal,KviDataBuffer * stream);
00045         virtual void decode(KviDataBuffer * stream,KviDataBuffer * signal);
00046         virtual int encodedFrameSize();
00047         virtual int decodedFrameSize();
00048 };

00075         virtual int decodedFrameSize();
